channel.title: Unreal-Engine-Blog on Daily Tech Articles Feed
channel.description: Recent content in Unreal-Engine-Blog on Daily Tech Articles Feed

item.title: The Fab October Flash Sale is now on!
item.description: 🎉 The Fab October Flash Sale is here! Enjoy discounts of up to 70% on thousands of assets. 🛍️ The sale runs from 10 AM ET on October 15 to 5 PM ET on October 19. Don’t miss out on this opportunity to save! Explore the highlights and get ready to shop! #FlashSale #OctoberDeals #Savings #ShopSmart #Discounts

item.title: MILES AND FLOWERS | Award-Winning Animated Short
item.description: 🎬 Exciting news in the animation world! The award-winning short film “Miles and Flowers” blends drama with humor for an engaging viewing experience. Created entirely in Unreal Engine, the filmmaker worked on this project for two years, focusing on a captivating story. Check it out and experience the unique storytelling! 🌼✨ #Animation #ShortFilm #UnrealEngine #MilesAndFlowers #FilmMaking

item.title: Five years, 35 car models: how Unreal Engine is accelerating HMI innovation
item.description: Unreal Engine is leading the way in automotive Human-Machine Interface (HMI) innovation. 🚗💻 In just five years, over 35 car models have integrated UE HMI, with more than two million vehicles on the road using this technology. The article highlights the significant advancements in creating immersive and design-focused digital cockpits. #AutomotiveInnovation #UnrealEngine #HMIDesign #DigitalCockpit #TechTrends

item.title: NITRO GEN OMEGA: Bringing the art style of “spaghetti anime” to life with UE5
item.description: 🎮 Dive into the world of NITRO GEN OMEGA! Gian Paolo Vernocchi, CEO of DESTINYbit, shares insights on how Unreal Engine 5 (UE5) has transformed their tactical RPG. The game combines turn-based mechanics with the dynamic feel of directing an anime episode. Discover the innovative approach that brings “spaghetti anime” art style to life! 🌟 #NITROGENOMEGA #GameDevelopment #UE5 #TacticalRPG #AnimeGaming

item.title: Highlights from the Unreal Fest Stockholm opening session
item.description: 🚀 Unreal Fest Stockholm kicked off with an exciting look at Unreal Engine 5.7, showcasing its latest features. 🔧 Developers working on Fortnite can expect new tools designed to enhance their creative process. 🤖 Additionally, the Epic Developer Assistant has expanded, providing even more support for developers. #UnrealFest #UnrealEngine #GameDevelopment #Fortnite #EpicGames

item.title: UE5 concept game trailer cinematic | SOJOURN
item.description: 🚀 Exciting news from the world of game development! The cinematic trailer for “Sojourn” showcases stunning visuals created in Unreal Engine. The creator, with a background in film and TV, shares insights into the challenges faced during this first Unreal project. Stay tuned for more updates on this journey! 🎮✨ #Sojourn #UnrealEngine #GameDevelopment #CinematicTrailer #Animation

item.title: Rematch reinvents football using Unreal Engine 5
item.description: Discover how the Paris-based indie team at Sloclap is using Unreal Engine 5 to transform football gaming. ⚽️ Their innovative approach aims to create an immersive experience that captures the true spirit of the sport. 🌟 Stay tuned for more updates on this exciting development! #Gaming #Football #UnrealEngine5 #IndieDev #Innovation

item.title: September learning content: Gameplay Ability System, MetaHumans, and more
item.description: 🚀 This month, Epic Games offers free courses to enhance your skills! Learn about the Gameplay Ability System, Character Movement Component, and networked physics. Additionally, dive into creating an optimized MetaHuman. Don’t miss this opportunity to expand your knowledge! 🎮 #EpicGames #GameDevelopment #MetaHumans #Learning #FreeCourses

item.title: Mafia: The Old Country: Making the old feel new with Unreal Engine 5
item.description: Discover how Hangar 13 is bringing the Mafia franchise to life with Unreal Engine 5. The team focuses on creating an authentic world and characters, enhancing the gaming experience for players. Stay tuned for more updates on this exciting project! 🎮🌍✨ #MafiaGame #UnrealEngine5 #GameDevelopment #Hangar13

item.title: Register now for the 2025 Epic MegaJam
item.description: 🎮 Exciting news for game developers! The 2025 Epic MegaJam is set to take place, marking 10 years of innovation in the industry. Gather your team and prepare for a week filled with creativity and game development. Participants will have the chance to win fantastic prizes from our sponsors. Don’t miss out on this opportunity to showcase your skills! #EpicMegaJam #GameDev #Innovation #Creativity #JoinUs

item.title: Ravine | Houdini - Unreal Engine Environment | Unreal Engine 5.7
item.description: 🌄 Exciting news in game development! The article discusses “Ravine,” an expansion of the earlier project “Clover.” This new environment utilizes Houdini-created assets, which were exported to Unreal Engine 5.7. The terrain design features ultra high polygon counts, enhancing the visual quality and detail of the scene. #GameDevelopment #UnrealEngine #Houdini #3DArt #EnvironmentDesign

item.title: Unreal Engine 5.7 Preview
item.description: 🚀 Unreal Engine 5.7 Preview has officially launched! You can download it now from the Epic Games Launcher, GitHub, or for Linux. This update introduces new tools and enhancements aimed at improving workflows and expanding creative possibilities. Explore the latest features and elevate your projects! #UnrealEngine #GameDevelopment #EpicGames

item.title: MetaHuman 5.7 Preview Released!
item.description: 🚀 Exciting news! The Unreal Engine 5.7 Preview is now live, featuring updates to both MetaHuman Creator and MetaHuman Animator. You can download the new version through the Epic Games Launcher, GitHub, and Linux. Explore the enhancements and take your creative projects to the next level! #UnrealEngine #MetaHuman #GameDevelopment #EpicGames #TechUpdate

item.title: Beneath Mount Fuji: Springtime Promenade
item.description: 🌸 Exciting news! A new real-time environment titled “Beneath Mount Fuji: Springtime Promenade” has been created using Unreal Engine 5. The scene beautifully showcases traditional Japanese architecture alongside the vibrant cherry blossom season. Experience the serene blend of culture and nature in this immersive environment! 🌳🏯 #UnrealEngine5 #VirtualReality #JapaneseCulture #CherryBlossoms #GameDevelopment

item.title: Fortnite Developers Will Soon Be Able to Sell In-Game Items
item.description: 🚀 Exciting news for Fortnite developers! Starting in December, they will have the ability to sell in-game items directly from their islands. This opens up new revenue opportunities beyond the current engagement payouts from item shop sales. Stay tuned for more updates on this development! #Fortnite #GameDev #InGameSales #GamingCommunity #RevenueGrowth

item.title: Bringing the urban Paris of La Haine to the stage with UE5
item.description: Silent Partners Studio has utilized 3D scans of Parisian housing projects to recreate the aesthetic of the film La Haine in Unreal Engine. This innovative approach aims to deliver an immersive theater experience that is both technically impressive and emotionally impactful. Explore how technology can enhance storytelling in the arts! 🎭🏙️ #LaHaine #Theater #UnrealEngine #ImmersiveArt #SilentPartnersStudio

item.title: Fab in Launcher is now available!
item.description: 🎉 Exciting news for creators! Fab in Launcher is now available, allowing users to access Fab’s diverse asset library directly within the Epic Games Launcher. With just one click, you can send assets to your preferred DCC tools and easily batch download content. Discover more about this new feature! #FabInLauncher #EpicGames #GameDevelopment #3DAssets #CreativeTools

item.title: Unreal Fellowship: Games—explore the making of six awesome games in three weeks
item.description: 🚀 The Unreal Fellowship: Games 2025 featured an immersive bootcamp for game developers, focusing on skill enhancement and collaboration. 🌟 Participants created six unique games in just three weeks, showcasing their creativity and technical abilities. Discover the inspiring stories behind these innovative projects! #UnrealFellowship #GameDevelopment #IndieGames #GamingCommunity #Innovation

item.title: The Sports Broadcast | Motion Design Sample is now available
item.description: 🎉 Exciting news for motion designers and livestreamers! A new sample project is now available, featuring a fully designed and animated setup. This resource supports various broadcast artist workflows, making it ideal for anyone interested in motion graphics. Explore the possibilities and enhance your skills with this comprehensive tool! #MotionDesign #BroadcastArt #Animation #Livestreaming #Graphics

item.title: Built with UE5, Borderlands 4 delivers ambitious scale with World Partition, Nanite, Lumen, and more
item.description: 🚀 Exciting advancements are coming to the Borderlands series with Borderlands 4! Gearbox Software highlights how Unreal Engine 5 features like World Partition and Nanite enhance gameplay. These technologies allow for larger, more detailed environments, improving player experience. Stay tuned for more updates on this ambitious installment! 🎮✨ #Borderlands4 #GameDevelopment #UE5 #GearboxSoftware #GamingNews

item.title: Fan-Made PREDATOR Cinematic: IT ALL ENDS | Unreal Engine 5.6 | MetaHuman
item.description: 🎬 Exciting news for fans of the Predator franchise! A talented group has released a fan-made cinematic titled “PREDATOR: IT ALL ENDS,” crafted entirely using Unreal Engine 5.6. This project showcases impressive visuals and storytelling. The creators shared insights about the production process, revealing they completed a total of 108 shots. Check it out and immerse yourself in this indie creation! #Predator #FanFilm #UnrealEngine #Cinematic #IndieFilm

item.title: Siili Auto: creating a great HMI experience with Unreal Engine
item.description: Siili Auto has selected Unreal Engine as their primary tool for designing, developing, and testing Human-Machine Interfaces (HMI). This choice is driven by Unreal Engine’s impressive visuals and efficiency. Additionally, it allows Siili Auto to craft unique, branded experiences for the automotive industry. 🚗✨🔧 #SiiliAuto #UnrealEngine #HMI #AutomotiveTech #Innovation

item.title: New report: explore how real-time tools could transform fashion
item.description: Discover the latest insights from The Interline’s new report on the evolution of 3D technology in fashion. Supported by Epic Games, this report highlights the advancements made and outlines future possibilities in the industry. Download the report to learn more! 📈👗✨ #FashionTech #3DModeling #Innovation #TheInterline #EpicGames

item.title: Cronos: The New Dawn is set to deliver pulse-pounding survival horror using UE5
item.description: 🕹️ Exciting developments in survival horror! The Bloober Team shared insights on “Cronos: The New Dawn,” highlighting their use of Unreal Engine 5 features like Lumen and Nanite. These technologies enhance combat mechanics and create a chilling atmosphere for players. Stay tuned for more updates on this intense gaming experience! 🎮🌌 #CronosTheNewDawn #SurvivalHorror #UnrealEngine5 #GameDevelopment #BlooberTeam

item.title: The Fab September Flash Sale is now on!
item.description: 🚨 The Fab September Flash Sale is here! 🚨 Enjoy discounts of up to 70% on thousands of assets. 🛍️ The sale kicks off at 10 AM ET on September 2 and will continue until 5 PM ET on September 5. Don’t miss out on these amazing deals! #FabSeptemberSale #Discounts #FlashSale #Savings #ShopNow

item.title: MetaHuman for Houdini Release
item.description: 🚀 Exciting news for creators! A new version of MetaHuman for Houdini is now available for download from Fab. This update allows users to bring MetaHuman characters to life in SideFX Houdini. This release enhances the integration between Unreal Engine and Houdini, streamlining workflows for developers. #MetaHuman #Houdini #GameDevelopment #3DArt #UnrealEngine

item.title: The future of Riot’s VALORANT is built on UE5
item.description: Riot Games is upgrading VALORANT from Unreal Engine 4 to Unreal Engine 5. Marcus Reid explains that this shift aims to enhance gameplay and graphics, ensuring the game remains competitive and appealing. The transition is part of Riot’s strategy to secure VALORANT’s future in the gaming landscape. 🎮✨ #VALORANT #RiotGames #GamingNews #UE5 #GameDevelopment

item.title: August learning content: MetaHuman, MetaSounds, and more.
item.description: 🚀 August brings new learning opportunities! This month’s free content includes tutorials on MetaHuman, Blueprint-controlled particle effects, and MetaSounds. Perfect for those looking to enhance their skills in these areas. Explore these resources and elevate your knowledge today! #Learning #MetaHuman #MetaSounds #SkillDevelopment #Tutorials

item.title: Watch the premiere of the award-winning animated short NEW IDEA here!
item.description: 🎥 Discover “NEW IDEA,” the award-winning animated short that has captured 26 accolades! This film showcases the inspiring journey of its creator, who faced challenges before finding success. Don’t miss the chance to watch this imaginative piece and appreciate its unique story! #NewIdea #Animation #FilmAwards #ShortFilm #Inspiration ✨

item.title: Forest in a (Water) Bottle | Virtual Aquarium
item.description: 🌳💧 Exploring the potential of Unreal Engine 5, this article discusses a test-bench scene featuring a virtual aquarium. The focus was on experimenting with new features during UE5’s Early Access phase. This project highlights the innovative possibilities for developers in creating immersive environments. #UnrealEngine5 #GameDevelopment #VirtualReality #Innovation

item.title: MONGIL: STAR DIVE brings monster collection and solo party play to PC, console, and mobile
item.description: 🚀 Exciting news in the gaming world! Netmarble Monster’s CEO, Ken Kim, recently shared insights about their new game, MONGIL: STAR DIVE. This cross-platform collectible action-adventure game is set to launch on PC, console, and mobile, developed using Unreal Engine 5. Stay tuned for more updates on this innovative gaming experience! 🎮✨ #MONGIL #StarDive #GamingNews #Netmarble #ActionAdventure

item.title: UE5 Automotive Cinematic
item.description: 🚗✨ Unreal Engine 5 (UE5) showcases its potential in automotive cinematics. The article dives into the technical aspects and features that make UE5 a powerful tool for creating stunning visuals in the automotive industry. It highlights how real-time rendering and advanced lighting techniques enhance vehicle presentations. The use of UE5 allows for greater creativity and efficiency in producing automotive content. #UnrealEngine5 #AutomotiveCinematics #3DRendering #GameDevelopment #Innovation

item.title: Register now for the Mega Stack-O-Jam game jam
item.description: 🎮 Join the Mega Stack-O-Jam starting August 14! This week-long game jam invites participants to explore level design using the new Stack-O-Bot sample. Learn from industry professionals and compete for exciting prizes. Don’t miss this chance to showcase your creativity! #GameJam #LevelDesign #StackOBot #CreativityUnleashed #GameDevelopment

item.title: Updated Stack-O-Bot for Unreal Engine 5.6—available now
item.description: 🚀 Exciting news for game developers! The updated Stack-O-Bot sample game is now available for Unreal Engine 5.6. This version includes numerous new features to enhance your experience. Whether you’re new to UE or seeking a strong base for your project, Stack-O-Bot offers valuable resources to boost your game development skills. #UnrealEngine #GameDevelopment #StackOBot #GameDesign #UE5

item.title: Cory Williams makes hit children’s YouTube channel featuring Silly Crocodile
item.description: Cory Williams is thriving as he creates engaging videos for his YouTube channel, Just For Kids, featuring a playful crocodile. 🐊 His innovative real-time pipeline allows him to produce content quickly while maintaining a strong connection with his audience. Discover more about Cory’s journey and his unique approach to children’s entertainment! 🎥✨ #YouTubeKids #ContentCreation #CoryWilliams #ChildrensEntertainment #SillyCrocodile

item.title: The Trials 2 – A New First-Person Puzzle Game
item.description: 🌟 Introducing “The Trials 2”! Ahmad Sultan, an independent game developer from Syria, has launched a new first-person puzzle game. The Trials 2 draws inspiration from well-known titles like The Talos Principle. Get ready to solve intricate puzzles and experience a unique gaming journey! #TheTrials2 #GameDevelopment #IndieGame #PuzzleGame #GamingCommunity

item.title: MetaHuman for Maya Release
item.description: 🚀 Exciting news for creators! The latest version of MetaHuman for Maya has been launched, featuring the new Pose Editor. This tool allows rigging artists to assemble and customize MetaHuman characters directly in Autodesk Maya. Explore the enhanced capabilities and improve your character creation process! #MetaHuman #Maya #3DAnimation #CharacterDesign #GameDev

item.title: Made with UE5, Wildgate blends emergent gameplay with explosive spaceship combat
item.description: 🚀 Exciting developments in gaming! Moonshot Games is using Unreal Engine 5 features like Nanite, Lumen, and Chaos in their debut project, the PvP space shooter Wildgate. These technologies enhance graphics and gameplay. Discover how these tools are shaping the future of gaming. #Wildgate #MoonshotGames #UE5 #GamingNews #SpaceShooter

item.title: Check out the winners of the Unreal Engine Dance Animation Challenge
item.description: Discover the remarkable winners of the Unreal Engine Dance Animation Challenge! 🎉 These entries showcase impressive dance animations that highlight creativity and skill. Check out the fantastic moves that have taken the spotlight! 💃🕺 #UnrealEngine #DanceAnimation #AnimationChallenge #Winners #Creativity

item.title: July’s free learning content: non-human digital characters, motion capture, and more
item.description: 🚀 Dive into July’s free learning content! Explore how to create non-human characters with MetaHuman, simulate realistic muscles using Chaos Flesh, and design procedural urban environments in Unreal Engine. These resources offer valuable insights for anyone looking to enhance their skills in digital character creation and animation! #GameDevelopment #UnrealEngine #MetaHuman #DigitalArt #LearningResources
